<title level="1" right="Action">[Retreat](/Actions.aspx?ID=1426) <actions string="Three Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 580</row>

</column>

---

Your army tries to escape from the battlefield. If your army is already [distant](/Conditions.aspx?ID=52), it flees the battlefield, is no longer part of the war encounter, and becomes [routed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=55). Otherwise, your army gains the distant condition.
